Class ClientPrintDirectUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.utils.ClientPrintDirectUtils

  • public final class ClientPrintDirectUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Sends the document object directly to print service.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public static void print(java.lang.String jobId,
                         javax.print.PrintService printService,
                         javax.print.attribute.PrintRequestAttributeSet printRequestAttributeSet,
                         javax.print.attribute.PrintJobAttributeSet printJobAttributeSet,
                         javax.print.attribute.DocAttributeSet docAttributeSet,
                         javax.print.DocFlavor docFlavor,
                         java.io.InputStream printData)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Sends the input stream file with the given preferences to the print service.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Identifying job id.
        printService - PrintService to print to.
        printRequestAttributeSet - Attributes to be set on the print service.
        printJobAttributeSet - Attributes for the print job.
        docAttributeSet - Attributes for the document.
        docFlavor - Document flavor.
        printData - Document as input stream to sent to the print service.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if service is not found and no default service.

        jobId - Id of the object.
        printService - Print service.
        printRequestAttributeSet - Print request Attribute set.
        printJobAttributeSet - Print Job attribute set.
        docAttributeSet - Document attribute set.
        pageable - Pageable.
        Throws:
        java.awt.print.PrinterException
